title: Resume
text:
255 Fulton St. • Camarillo, CA 93010 Phone: (805) 340-7610 • E-mail: epperson.kiah@yahoo.com



Eager to leverage dual BS degrees in Computer Science and Mathematics to innovate and solve complex problems in a dynamic tech environment.




California State University Channel Islands | Camarillo, CA Bachelor of Science in Computer Science Bachelor of Science in Mathematics with emphasis in Applied Mathematics - Will graduate in December 2024 - Involved in a semester-long project to create a coloring book application for iOS devices
2021–2024




Amazon Fulfillment Center | Camarillo, CA Amazon Shipping Warehouse Worker November 2023 – January 2024 - Managed the accurate and timely picking, packing, and shipping of over 500 daily orders, maintaining a 99% accuracy rate and contributing to the center’s efficiency and customer satisfaction. - Operated warehouse machinery, including forklifts and pallet jacks, adhering to strict safety guidelines to ensure a safe working environment for all employees. - Utilized Amazon’s warehouse management systems for inventory control, order tracking, and shipping logistics, enhancing operational efficiency and reducing error rates.
Rite-Aid | Ojai, CA Shift Supervisor November 2021 – October 2022 - Led a team of 10+ employees, overseeing shift operations to ensure excellent customer service, operational efficiency, and adherence to company policies. - Managed inventory levels, performed regular stock assessments, and coordinated the ordering of new supplies, reducing inventory discrepancies by 20%. - Handled cash management responsibilities, including till balancing, deposits, and transaction verifications, maintaining impeccable financial accuracy. - Resolved customer complaints and issues promptly, employing strong problem-solving skills to maintain high levels of customer loyalty and repeat business.





Basic Knowledge of Spanish
Fluent in English

title: About
text:
About Me
Hi, I’m Kiah Epperson! I’m a CS and Math student at CSUCI. I love playing videos and watching anime.
Some facts about me: - I enjoy making jewelry. - I’m passionate about my family.

title: Home
text:
Hello, my name is Kiah Epperson. I’m studying Computer Science and Mathematics with an emphasis in Applied Mathematics, and I’m passionate about my family.





I look forward to sharing my journey with you!
